context_of_use: This use case allows urban mobility planners to calculate and review various impacts of proposed mobility measures or events.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: to validate urban mobility proposals and assess their impacts
description: Calculate and review cost, emissions, noise levels, and sensor-based traffic metrics for proposed mobility measures or events.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates the estimation process for a proposed measure.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner has access to the urban mobility planning system.
Proposed measures or events are defined.
postconditions: The estimated cost, emissions, noise levels, and traffic metrics are calculated and available for review.
assumptions: The system has access to relevant data for cost, emissions, noise levels, and traffic metrics.
requirements_met: The system shall provide an estimation of the cost of a measure.
The system shall provide an estimation of congestion emissions.
The system shall provide an estimation of traffic noise levels.
The system shall allow review of emission levels at pollution sensors.
The system shall allow review of traffic levels at traffic sensors.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the data sources for cost, emissions, and noise level estimations.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → The system retrieves data for the proposed measure.
2. urban mobility planner → The system calculates the estimated cost of the measure.
3. urban mobility planner → The system calculates the estimated congestion emissions.
4. urban mobility planner → The system calculates the estimated traffic noise levels.
5. urban mobility planner → The system retrieves emission levels from pollution sensors.
6. urban mobility planner → The system retrieves traffic levels from traffic sensors.
7. urban mobility planner → The system presents the calculated estimates and sensor data for review.
